attributes.action: Ensure free parking for all Hospital Staff
attributes.additional_details: It would be a small way for the country to show their appreciation to ensure all staff can permanently park at the hospital they work in for free..  This should include everyone, Porters, Doctors, Nurses, Cleaners, reception staff and all others who face increased risk during the Covid 19 outbreak
attributes.background: Ensure all staff do not pay car park charges at any UK hospital
